column4: My sound used to work on 8.04...  under 8.10 it only works on AC-3.  Anyone have any ideas of what I can do to fix it?
hi ActionParsnip, i've read the faqs and tried all of those links.  Any more ideas?
id run lspci and see if they need more config
copy the line for you card to your favourite search engine and see what you can see
